name: Underground (itch) (A_Krit's_All_You_Need)
description:
Underground by A Krit 's All You Needs

Game for Godot Wild Jam #45 Theme Underground

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Description

Congratulation, you are now the underground train controller. Your goal is to ensure that people are able to reach destination safely.  Follow the control instruction below and lead your passenger to freedom! All passengers aren't equal, only make sure you pick up passenger that will make you be alive in the end.

Control

Press Go - To move the train

Press Stop - To Stop the train

Press Door - To open the door or close the door (Can only be done when the train is stopped)
